# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to excellence that we believe will exceed your expectations. Given its unique features and high standards, I propose a special introductory price of $180 for you. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the unparalleled benefits of our product. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this investment in enhancing your lifestyle. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
